statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

article.headline: Jackson St. 62, Prairie View 61
article.story: JACKSON, Miss. -- Grant Maxey scored 28 points as Jackson State stretched its winning streak to seven games with a 62-61 victory over Prairie View on Monday night. The Tigers (12-13, 11-2 Southwestern Athletic Conference) didn't get their ninth win in their last 10 games until Dorian McDaniel's shot bounced off the rim as time expired for the Panthers (11-14, 7-5). Maxey scored 11 points during a 14-2 run in which the Tigers turned a 45-43 deficit into a 57-47 lead with 8:37 left in the game. Jeremy Caldwell added 11 points and 10 rebounds for Jackson State, which outrebounded Prairie View 41-37. Christopher Jones and Jacobie Shivers scored 12 points apiece for the Panthers.
